data.persona: I am the priest at the kingdom's chapel. I deliver the sermon every week where all the townspeople sit quietly and listen to me. I also baptize the newborns and help bury the dead.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a table, two bones, a temple, a map, and a religious text here.
The worshipper is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to look at the map
data.mid_motivation: I plan to show the map to the king tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to be a part of the party the king would send to find the hidden island
